title: Alice in Wonderland
text: Alice falls into a rabbit hole and enters a world full of imagination.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring.
text: An unusual alliance of man, elf, dwarf, wizard and hobbit seek to destroy a powerful ring.

title: Gone With The Wind
text: I loved something I made up, something that's just as dead as Melly is. I made a pretty suit of clothes and fell in love with it. And when Ashley came riding along, so handsome, so different, I put that suit on him and made him wear it whether it fitted him or not. And I wouldn't see what he really was. I kept on loving the pretty clothesâ€”and not him at all.
